item.description:
Water for Elephants2011PG-13

121 minutes

In this captivating Depression-era melodrama, impetuous veterinary student Jacob Jankowski joins a celebrated circus as an animal caretaker but faces a wrenching dilemma when he's transfixed by angelic married performer Marlena.
Cast:Reese Witherspoon, Robert Pattinson, Christoph Waltz, Paul Schneider, Jim Norton, Hal Holbrook, Mark Povinelli, Richard Brake, Stephen TaylorDirector:Francis LawrenceGenres:Drama, Romantic Dramas, Dramas Based on Bestsellers, 20th Century Period Pieces, Dramas Based on the Book, Period PiecesThis movie is:Emotional, Suspenseful, Sentimental, Romantic

 

ENNEAGRAM AT THE MOVIES

Vegetarian dinner provided from 7 to 8pm.

Fine to show up anytime. It's helpful for me to know in advance if you are coming, particularly if you are eating, though if fine just to show up if you can't decide beforehand. You are welcome to bring additional items if you want. Movie starts at 8pm and generally ends approximately at 10:30pm. We stop the movie on occasion to talk about Enneagram types, subtypes and relationship dynamics.

The cost is $20-25 sliding scale. Please feel free to bring friends and I can help them learn the types if they don't know the Enneagram.

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, having taught over 2000 Enneagram personality types workshops, as well as the Myers-Briggs and Astrology. He is an author of 2 books, a psychotherapist for individuals, couples and families and leads Personality Types Trainings for groups, organizations, churches, schools, colleges and yoga centers.

herb@herbpearce.com

781 648 373

www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Personality Types in the Movies - Water for Elephants
